Topic.Title: Lawsuit Being Prepared Against YHOO

Message.Msg: I disagree, go review some other cases the DOJ is involved concerning public gay bashing. YHOO has a clearly defined TOS agreement and has a past history of taking action against of variety of posters for spam, stalking, foul language, racial taunts, etc. On some occasions, I have tried to make the same informative post on different boards and it appears YHOO has developed a means to prevent this. It seems strange to me that YHOO gets so worked up over spam and does nothing about this. If I can easily pull up posts with gay slurs, certainly YHOO can find and remove these posts at the minimum, if not preventing future posts by that ID. It appears to me that YHOO now has an indifferent and callous attitude towards its message board users which speaks volumes. I'm sure if their advertising customers get a whiff of this, it won't make them happy. It's simply bad business to let things like this go.
